bibl.title: Egypt in the Graeco-Roman World: from Ptolemaic Kingdom to Roman Province.
Regime Change in the Ancient Near East and Egypt. From Sargon of Agade to Saddam Hussein
bibl.author: BOWMAN, Alan K.

bibl.note: [Introduction.] - Egypt under Persian and Ptolemaic Rule. - Egypt under Caesar and the Triumvirs. - From Ptolemaic to Roman Egypt. - Conclusion. - References.
bibl.seg: BOWMAN Alan K., Egypt in the Graeco-Roman World: from Ptolemaic Kingdom to Roman Province.
Harriet CRAWFORD (Ed.), Regime Change in the Ancient Near East and Egypt. From Sargon of Agade to Saddam Hussein = Proceedings of the British Academy. 136 (Oxford, 2007) pp. 165-181.
